legislation.Legislation: S.B. 79 - Single-sex facilities ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans trans people from single-sex spaces based on sex at birth.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 486 - Bathroom/facilities restrictions
legislation.Status Notes: Bans trans people from single-sex spaces; allows lawsuits.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 444 - Healthcare provider refusal
legislation.Status Notes: Allows doctors to refuse gender transition treatments.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 1916 - Gender-affirming care malpractice
legislation.Status Notes: Defines gender-affirming care for youth as malpractice.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 1669 - Foster care exemption
legislation.Status Notes: Allows anti-LGBTQ+ parents to foster LGBTQ+ children.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 1616 - Religious exemptions
legislation.Status Notes: Creates religious exemptions for nondiscrimination protections.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 1307 - Public funds restriction
legislation.Status Notes: Restricts public funds from covering gender-affirming care.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 2438 - Birth certificate gender marker ban
legislation.Status Notes: Vetoed by Gov. Hobbs May 2025. Would have banned gender marker changes on birth certificates.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 1694 - DEI/gender identity ban in higher ed
legislation.Status Notes: Vetoed by Gov. Hobbs May 2025. Would have banned DEI/gender identity courses.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 1256 - State agency DEI ban
legislation.Status Notes: Vetoed by Gov. Hobbs May 2025. Would have banned gender identity policies at state agencies.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 2062 - Legal recognition erasure
legislation.Status Notes: Vetoed by Gov. Hobbs 2025. Would have erased trans people from legal recognition.

legislation.Legislation: H.R. 28 - Protection of Women and Girls in Sports Act
legislation.Status Notes: Passed House 218-206 on Jan 14, 2025. Awaiting Senate action.

legislation.Legislation: H.R. 3492 - Protect Children's Innocence Act
legislation.Status Notes: Scheduled for House floor vote Dec 17, 2025. Would criminalize gender-affirming care for minors.

legislation.Legislation: H.R. 498 - Do No Harm in Medicaid Act
legislation.Status Notes: Scheduled for House vote Dec 17, 2025. Would ban Medicaid coverage of gender-affirming care for youth.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 1 - Facilities and sports ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans trans students from facilities and sports teams aligned with gender identity.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 185 - Prison healthcare restrictions
legislation.Status Notes: Restricts gender-affirming care for incarcerated people.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 36 - Religious exemptions
legislation.Status Notes: Allows religious exemptions to deny housing, healthcare, equal pay.

legislation.Legislation: S.F. 418 - Comprehensive anti-trans bill
legislation.Status Notes: Removes gender identity from antidiscrimination law, bans birth certificate changes, bans instruction through 6th grade.

legislation.Legislation: H.F. 1049 - Adult Medicaid ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans Medicaid from covering gender-affirming care for adults.

legislation.Legislation: H.F. 856 - DEI ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans DEI programs at public institutions.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 264 - Facilities ban (prisons, colleges, shelters)
legislation.Status Notes: Bans trans people from facilities in prisons, colleges, shelters.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 352 - K-12 instruction ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans instruction on LGBTQ+ identities K-12.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 1198 - University DEI ban
legislation.Status Notes: Prohibits DEI initiatives at universities.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 59 - Healthcare provider exemptions
legislation.Status Notes: Religious exemptions for healthcare providers.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 1027 - Employer protection
legislation.Status Notes: Protects employers refusing to facilitate gender transition treatments.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 41 - Flag ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans LGBTQ+ flags at public buildings.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 239 - Parental permission for sex ed
legislation.Status Notes: Requires parent permission to study human sexuality.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 1041 - Sports ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans trans women from women's sports.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 1412 - Non-abusive classification
legislation.Status Notes: Classifies parents denying youth gender-affirming care as non-abusive.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 63 - Youth healthcare ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans gender-affirming care for minors.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 2311 - Foster care exemption
legislation.Status Notes: Allows anti-LGBTQ+ parents to foster LGBTQ+ children.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 501 - Youth healthcare ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans gender-affirming care for youth.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 4 - School DEI ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans DEI initiatives in public schools.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 2 - Prison healthcare restrictions
legislation.Status Notes: Restricts gender-affirming care for incarcerated people.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 495 - Medicaid ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans Medicaid from covering gender-affirming care.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 371 - Religious exemptions
legislation.Status Notes: Creates religious exemptions for discrimination.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 188 - Prison housing ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans trans women from women's prisons.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 121 - Facilities ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans trans people from single-sex spaces based on sex at birth.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 300 - Discrimination classification
legislation.Status Notes: Classifies trans people using aligned facilities as discrimination.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 682 - Detransition coverage
legislation.Status Notes: Requires Medicaid to cover detransition treatment.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 690 - Non-abusive classification
legislation.Status Notes: Classifies parents denying youth gender-affirming care as non-abusive.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 218 - Detransition lawsuits
legislation.Status Notes: Allows those who regret transitioning to sue doctors.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 819 - Flag ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans LGBTQ+ flags at government buildings.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 805 - Comprehensive anti-trans bill
legislation.Status Notes: Initially vetoed by Gov. Stein July 2025; veto overridden. Defines sex, restricts birth certificates, bans facilities access, limits healthcare.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 442 - Foster/custody exemption
legislation.Status Notes: Allows anti-LGBTQ+ parents to foster or get custody of LGBTQ+ children.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 558 - Higher ed DEI ban
legislation.Status Notes: Vetoed by Gov. Stein July 2025. Would have eliminated DEI in public higher ed.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 227 - K-12 DEI ban
legislation.Status Notes: Vetoed by Gov. Stein July 2025. Would have banned DEI in K-12 education.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 171 - Government DEI ban
legislation.Status Notes: Vetoed by Gov. Stein July 2025. Would have banned DEI in state/local government.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 1144 - School facilities ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans trans students from facilities aligned with gender identity.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 377 - Puberty blockers/HRT ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans puberty blockers and HRT for trans youth only.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 712 - Surgery ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans breast surgeries for minors.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 148 - Biological sex classification
legislation.Status Notes: Failed. Would have permitted classification based on biological sex.

legislation.Legislation: A.B. 56 - Medicaid provider training
legislation.Status Notes: Requires extra training for Medicaid officials treating trans people.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 658 - Foster care exemption
legislation.Status Notes: Allows anti-LGBTQ+ parents to foster LGBTQ+ children.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 418 - Prison housing ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans incarcerated trans people from facilities aligned with identity.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 1688 - Birth certificate requirements
legislation.Status Notes: Requires biological sex on birth certificates; bans nonbinary designations.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 1259 - Facilities ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans trans people from single-sex spaces based on sex at birth.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 0937 - Misgendering protection
legislation.Status Notes: Allows teachers to misgender trans students.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 0955 - Healthcare religious exemptions
legislation.Status Notes: Allows healthcare providers to refuse treatments based on religion.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 0064 - School facilities ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans trans students from facilities aligned with gender identity.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 8 - Bathroom ban (government buildings)
legislation.Status Notes: Bans trans people from facilities in state agencies, higher ed, political subdivisions. Effective Dec 4, 2025.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 12 - Parental notification
legislation.Status Notes: Requires parental permission for students to use different name/pronouns.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 229 - Sex definition
legislation.Status Notes: Defines sex as unchanging and exclusively male or female.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 18 - Mental health counseling ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans mental health practitioners from affirming identities of trans minors.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 1188 - Medical records access
legislation.Status Notes: Requires government access to medical records containing biological sex info.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 239 - Bathroom ban (schools)
legislation.Status Notes: Failed. Would have banned trans students from school bathrooms.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 269 - Comprehensive facilities ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans trans people from public facilities based on sex at birth, including schools.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 283 - Foster care exemption
legislation.Status Notes: Allows anti-LGBTQ+ parents to foster LGBTQ+ children.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 252 - Prison healthcare restrictions
legislation.Status Notes: Restricts gender-affirming care for incarcerated people.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 74 - Sex change requirements
legislation.Status Notes: Creates strict requirements for legally changing one's sex.

legislation.Legislation: H.B. 77 - Flag ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans LGBTQ+ flags at government buildings.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 299 - Healthcare ban expansion
legislation.Status Notes: Removes suicide risk exception for youth healthcare ban; redefines sex.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 154 - Education ban/forced outing
legislation.Status Notes: Prohibits LGBTQ+ instruction in schools; forces teachers to out students.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 474 - DEI ban
legislation.Status Notes: Bans DEI initiatives in public institutions.

legislation.Legislation: S.B. 456 - Facilities ban
legislation.Status Notes: Defines sex as unchanging; bans trans people from public facilities.

legislation.Status Notes: Defines sex as unchanging and exclusively male or female.

legislation.Status Notes: Bans gender-affirming care for youth.

legislation.Status Notes: Bans trans students from sports teams aligned with gender identity.

legislation.Status Notes: Bans trans students from school facilities aligned with gender identity.

legislation.Status Notes: Bans trans people from government facilities based on sex at birth.

legislation.Status Notes: Allows religious exemptions to deny housing, healthcare, equal pay.

legislation.Legislation: AR HB1570 - SAFE Act

legislation.Legislation: AR - Fairness in Women's Sports Act
legislation.Status Notes: Signed March 2021. Bans transgender girls from sports that align with their gender identity, elementary through college.

legislation.Legislation: MS - Mississippi Fairness Act
legislation.Status Notes: Signed March 11, 2021. First statewide anti-trans law of 2021. Bans transgender girls and women from competing in women's sports.

legislation.Legislation: TN - Anti-trans sports bill
legislation.Status Notes: Signed March 2021. Requires students to prove assigned sex at birth to play in middle and high school sports.

legislation.Legislation: ID HB500 - Fairness in Women's Sports Act
legislation.Status Notes: Signed March 2020. Banned transgender girls and women from competing in women's sports. Later blocked by federal court injunction in August 2020.

legislation.Legislation: ID - Birth certificate gender marker ban
legislation.Status Notes: Prohibited transgender people from changing sex on birth certificates. Struck down by federal court as unconstitutional.
